GDPR.TITLE: Access denied
GDPR.TEXT: In order to use this application, you must comply with our cookie policy.

REGISTER.FORM_CONFIRM: Your changes have not been saved yet. Are you sure you want to leave?

PAYMENT.CHECK_DETAILS: Please check the details below are correct.

ACCOUNT.TITLE: Confirm account sharing with {{merchantName}}
ACCOUNT.CHECK_DETAILS: Please check the details below are correct.
ACCOUNT.SELECT_ACCOUNT: Please select and confirm account(s) to share information:
ACCOUNT.EXPIRE: {{client}} will access your information from your account(s) until:
ACCOUNT.PROCEED_ACCOUNT: Press Proceed to start sharing your account(s)
ACCOUNT.REVIEW_DATA: Review the data you will be sharing
ACCOUNT.ACCESS.PERIOD: The application has requested access to your transactions from {{from}} to {{to}}

INTERNATIONAL-PAYMENT.REFRESH_RATE_INFO: This rate is valid for the next 5 minutes, if you navigate away from this page now the rate we’ve quoted you may change

FUNDS-CONFIRMATION.TITLE: Funds Availability requested by {{merchantName}}
FUNDS-CONFIRMATION.ACCOUNT: We have received a request from card issuer to provide a confirmation of sufficient funds from the following account.
FUNDS-CONFIRMATION.CONFIRM_TEXT: Please confirm that you would like us to respond to future confirmation of funds requests from the card issuer.
FUNDS-CONFIRMATION.DISCLAIMER: Please note that the card issuer will never see your account balance. We will only provide a 'yes' or 'no' answer to the card issuer when you use your card.

AuthenticatorPushRegistration2.TITLE: Set up 2-step verification
AuthenticatorPushRegistration2.SUBTITLE: Secure your account by setting up 2-step authentication with your mobile device.

AuthenticatorPushRegistration3.TITLE: Get the {{clientName}} app
AuthenticatorPushRegistration3.SUBTITLE: To continue you need to first install the {{clientName}} app.

AuthenticatorPush3.TITLE: P2-step verification
AuthenticatorPush3.SUBTITLE: Open the {{clientName}} app on your mobile device and tap ‘authorise’ to continue.

FREQUENCY.IntrvlWkDay: Every {{weekNumber}} week, on the {{dayNumber}} day of the week.
FREQUENCY.WkInMnthDay: Every month, on the {{weekNumber}} week of the month, and on the {{dayNumber}} day of the week.
FREQUENCY.IntrvlMnthDay: Every {{monthNumber}} month, on the {{dayNumber}} day of the month.
FREQUENCY.IntrvlMnthDayFromEndMonth: Every {{monthNumber}} month, on the {{dayNumber}} last day of the month.

QtrDay.ENGLISH: Paid on the 25th March, 24th June, 29th September and 25th December.
QtrDay.SCOTTISH: Paid on the 2nd February, 15th May, 1st August and 11th November.
QtrDay.RECEIVED: Paid on the 20th March, 19th June, 24th September and 20th December.
